<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// short inputs. Based on the SipHash reference implementation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// compute ABI-stable ptrauth discriminators.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Computes a SipHash-2-4 128-bit result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abc54d0205758f7b576ea87bd3ba70a5e">getSipHash&#95;2&#95;4&#95;128</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> In, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t (&amp;K)&#91;16&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal">                        uint8&#95;t (&amp;Out)&#91;16&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute a stable non-zero 16-bit hash of the given string.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The exact algorithm is the little-endian interpretation of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// non-doubled (i.e. 64-bit) result of applying a SipHash-2-4 using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a specific seed value which can be found in the source.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This 64-bit result is truncated to a non-zero 16-bit value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We use a 16-bit discriminator because ARM64 can efficiently load</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a 16-bit immediate into the high bits of a register without disturbing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the remainder of the value, which serves as a nice blend operation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 16 bits is also sufficiently compact to not inflate a loader relocation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We disallow zero to guarantee a different discriminator from the places</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in the ABI that use a constant zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">uint16&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a95bf65a141564e084f6fac52c00b6a6d">getPointerAuthStableSipHash</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> S);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight></CodeLine>
